Html:
I like this tool, but I find the constant movement makes it difficult to control the mouse precisely. Could you add an argument to set the jiggleTimer.Interval?
thanks, Rob
I second this request! I only need it to jiggle every 10 minutes or so and the constant jiggle causes issues with another app that records mouse usage, even in zen mode. Thanks!
I'll put it on the list for the 1.7 release.
